You see this? You see this fucking shit? Screw these things, Fuck these things. I will NEVER get on one of these.

I like how they don't even react.

topics.body:
From Tumblr:


"my friend is in japan right now and one of the members of his tour group wanted to find a wifi connection to blog or whatever so this guy goes to the first place he finds that has ‘cafe’ and ‘internet’ on the sign and for $5 he gets a computer cubicle and a picnic basket to himself and obviously hes a little puzzled by the picnic basket bit so he opens it up and it contains a box of tissues a stack of hentai magazines three porn dvds two condoms a towel and a 500ml bottle of lube and thats the story about how a tourist accidentally went to a japanese masturbation cafe"
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a
